comments.author: Nabrok.9023
comments.body: Yeah, wvw is down again (all of it, not just the API). I suppose this time it might be on purpose for the impending patch.

comments.author: Zarenda Mal.1364
comments.body:
Just got the same thing. My program was recording match data and suddenly instead I got this:

{"error":10,product,module,line,“text”:“invalid match_id”}

And checking against matches I got:

{"wvw_matches":[]}

comments.author: Cliff Spradlin.3512
comments.body: There was a brief outage for WvW, and the WvW API (correctly) reported that there were no matches running. The outage has been resolved and I believe the API has now stabilized. Sorry for the trouble!

comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body: Yep, the WvW APIs are wigged out right now.

comments.author: Rurik Telmonkin.3648
comments.body:
I was redesigning a program I am writing and had trouble with matches.json and getting a match ID, so I thought I would check the matches.json page through the forumn here, and it appears to be empty, as if there are no matches happening.

Does anyone know whats happening here?
